description: Generates personalized wellness tasks based on mental health assessments and user patterns

recommended_tasks.task_description: Find a quiet place, close your eyes, and follow a guided breathing exercise focusing on inhaling deeply for 4 seconds, holding for 4 seconds, and exhaling for 6 seconds.
recommended_tasks.expected_benefit: This helps reduce immediate anxiety and promotes relaxation.
recommended_tasks.personalization_reason: Recommended to address your moderate anxiety and provide immediate stress relief.

recommended_tasks.task_description: Choose a consistent bedtime and wake-up time to regulate your sleep. Write it down and aim to stick to it for the next week.
recommended_tasks.expected_benefit: Establishing a regular sleep pattern can help improve sleep quality and reduce sleep issues.
recommended_tasks.personalization_reason: This task is tailored to address your sleep problems.

recommended_tasks.task_description: Reach out to a friend or family member. Send a text message or make a short phone call to check in and share how you're feeling.
recommended_tasks.expected_benefit: Connecting with others combats feelings of isolation and supports emotional well-being.
recommended_tasks.personalization_reason: Helps to address your social isolation by promoting social interaction.

result.encouragement_message: Remember, small steps lead to big changes! You're doing great by seeking support.
